name: Real time clock

notes.short: Real time clock to support collecting data with precise time stamps.

packets.name: status_code
packets.description:
Reports the current state or error status of the device. ``code`` is a standardized value from 
the Jacdac status/error codes. ``vendor_code`` is any vendor specific error code describing the device
state. This report is typically not queried, when a device has an error, it will typically
add this report in frame along with the announce packet.

packets.name: status_code_changed
packets.description: Notifies that the status code of the service changed.

packets.name: instance_name
packets.description:
A friendly name that describes the role of this service instance in the device.
It often corresponds to what's printed on the device:
for example, `A` for button A, or `S0` for servo channel 0.
Words like `left` should be avoided because of localization issues (unless they are printed on the device).

packets.name: streaming_samples
packets.description:
Asks device to stream a given number of samples
(clients will typically write `255` to this register every second or so, while streaming is required).

packets.name: streaming_interval
packets.description: Period between packets of data when streaming in milliseconds.

packets.name: streaming_preferred_interval
packets.description: Preferred default streaming interval for sensor in milliseconds.

packets.name: local_time
packets.description:
Current time in 24h representation. 
* ``day_of_month`` is day of the month, starting at ``1``
* ``day_of_week`` is day of the week, starting at ``1`` as monday
Default streaming period is 1 second.
packets.packFormat: u16 u8 u8 u8 u8 u8 u8

packets.name: error
packets.description: Time drift since the last call to the ``set_time`` command.

packets.name: precision
packets.description: Error on the clock, in parts per million of seconds.

packets.name: variant
packets.description: The type of physical clock used by the sensor.

packets.name: set_time
packets.description: Sets the current time and resets the error.
packets.packFormat: u16 u8 u8 u8 u8 u8 u8
